name: Environmental Health & Safety Building

images.alt: Street view of Environmental Health & Safety Building.

access: Location: 96 Albert Street is located at the corner of Queen’s Crescent on the West side of the street.

Entrances – there is no accessible entrance to this building
East (Main entrance): The main entrance is located on the east side of the building with a set of stairs leading up to it.
Corridors: Floors 2 and 3 are completely inaccessible because there is no elevator between floors.
Wayfinding: The signage for this building is located on the left side of the pathway towards the entrance of the building.
Washrooms (there are no accessible washrooms in this building): There are 3 all-gender, single-user washrooms in this building.
Services: Environmental Health and Safety is located within this building.
Parking: There is street parking available around this building and a parking lot on the North-East corner of Albert and Union St.
